ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT m.name,r.* FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN pf_riseinfo r ON r.person_id=m.id INNER JOIN mm_relation rl ON rl.member_id=m.id WHERE rl.reg_merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ('{keyword}' = '' OR (m.usr LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%')) ORDER BY {order} LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN pf_riseinfo r ON r.person_id=m.id INNER JOIN mm_relation rl ON rl.member_id=m.id WHERE rl.reg_merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ('{keyword}' = '' OR (m.usr LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%'))
